GMTimeClock.moduleSettingsPaused.name: will the clock paused when game paused
GMTimeClock.moduleSettingsPaused.hint: if it is checked the clock would stop count when the game is paused.
GMTimeClock.forceFalseDebugMode.name: Forced Ture off Debug Mode
GMTimeClock.forceFalseDebugMode.hint: Debug Mode will pinging some debug info every second.
GMTimeClock.reset.name: Reset
GMTimeClock.reset.hint: Resets the clock. Only works when foundry is started the next time
